meta_title: Why Chain Conveyors Stretch: Root Causes of Rapid Elongation
meta_description: Chain conveyors stretch quickly due to wear elongation at the pin and bushing joints, not metal deformation. Learn how lubrication and alignment stop the wear.
title: Root Cause Analysis: Why Chain Conveyors Experience Rapid Elongation and "Stretch"
keyword: why chain conveyors stretch so quickly

image_prompt: A high-detail, photo-realistic macro shot of an industrial roller chain on a sprocket. The image should show a maintenance technician in high-visibility gear and gloves using a precision caliper or chain wear gauge to measure the distance between pins. The background should be a clean but active manufacturing floor with soft-focus machinery. The lighting should highlight the metallic texture of the chain and the presence of a thin oil film.
